Item.Name: Enzo's Hideaway
Item.Content:
Enzo's Hideaway in The Landing, Disney Springs, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Enzo's Hideaway

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18808553.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Sip on prohibition-era cocktails and enjoy delicious bites at a tunnel bar exuding an intimate, 1920s speakeasy-vibe.

[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001710.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
The world-famous chocolatier delivers decadent sundaes smothered with hot, house-made fudge as well as chocolate treats and drinks. Strike It Rich with specialty San Francisco-themed sundaes, shakes and floats. Coffee is also available.

Item.Name: House of Blues Restaurant & Bar
Item.Content:
House of Blues Restaurant & Bar in West Side, Disney Springs, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for House of Blues Restaurant & Bar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001754.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Make your taste buds sing at this lively restaurant and bar featuring a mix of Southern and global cuisine. Big draws include a daily drink specials from 3:00 to 5:00 PM and a soulful Sunday brunch.
  Book House of Blues Restaurant & Bar Dining Reservations
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Details, tips, and information for Jock Lindsey's Hangar Bar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18107544.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Experience the exotic ambience of this 1940s airplane hangar turned dive bar—the former office, home and hang-out of Indiana Jones' pilot and sidekick, Jock Lindsey. Satisfy your taste for adventure with delicious delicacies and daredevil spirits—adventure with a kick!
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Lava Lounge at Rainforest Cafe®
Item.Content:
Lava Lounge at Rainforest Cafe® in Marketplace, Disney Springs, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Lava Lounge at Rainforest Cafe®

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/17480848.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Cool off with a tropical cocktail at the bar of this refreshing Rainforest Cafe hotspot. Then, while your thirst gets quenched, peer out at picturesque views of Village Lake via the “lava tube”—a molten magma-inspired experience flowing in the walls near the restaurant’s entrance.

Item.Name: Morimoto Asia
Item.Content:
Morimoto Asia in The Landing, Disney Springs, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Morimoto Asia

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/17936194.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Experience the finest in Pan-Asian cuisine as Chef Masaharu Morimoto of Iron Chef America unveils his newest, most exciting restaurant yet! The dazzling 3-story venue and equally vast menu showcase Morimoto’s unique take on Japanese, Chinese and Korean food and culture—and create an unforgettable dining experience.
  Cuisine: Asian/Japanese/Seafood/Sushi
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18424498.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Try a classic Canadian dish - hot, thick-cut French fries loaded with tasty toppings such as cheddar cheese curds and beef gravy. You'll find 4 varieties along with an assortment of specialty sips.
Tom says...
Definitely skippable, there are many other options at Disney Springs that give you a better value for the price.

[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/17728113.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Savor slow-cooked favorites and BBQ classics at this simmering stop outside House of Blues Restaurant & Bar. Sink your teeth into pulled pork sandwiches, smoked turkey legs and all-beef hot dogs, and then wash it all down with some beer or wine.

Item.Name: Vivoli il Gelato
Item.Content:
Vivoli il Gelato in The Landing, Disney Springs, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Vivoli il Gelato

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18099281.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Experience the hand-crafted goodness of Italian gelati, sorbetti, espresso drinks and more. After 85 years, this world-famous, family-run gelato shop from Florence, Italy has chosen to open its second storefront in history—right at Disney Springs!
  Cuisine: Italian

Item.Content:
YeSake Kiosk in West Side, Disney Springs, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for YeSake Kiosk

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18430303.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Stretch your palate at this globally inspired kiosk featuring bowls and wraps you can customize with your choice of protein, toppings and sauce. Pair your creation with a fruity slush, sake, beer or soft drink.
